content: spiral fringe hat & scarf the hat was crocheted to fit a 20-inch circumference head for a five-year-old adjustments may be made by changing hook size or following the suggestions given at the start of pattern materials model was crocheted with bernat softee chunky™ pale antique rose 246 yds crochet hook size k or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle gauge 3 dcs = one inch 2 double_crochet row = one inch abbreviations chain = chain st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet beg = beginning yo = yarn over space = space shell = 3 dcs in same st scarf if making scarf for an adult or older child add more chs to foundation row in multiples of 2 chain 18 row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across chain 3 turn 17 scs row 2 double_crochet in first st half-shell made * skip next st 3 double_crochet in next st shell made skip next st single_crochet in next st repeat from * across shell repeat from * across ending with single_crochet in top of previous row s chain-3 repeat row 2 and 3 until you have a total of five shell-pattern row completed at end of last shell row chain 4 row 7 double_crochet in first single_crochet chain 1 * double_crochet in middle double_crochet of shell chain 1 double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * across ending with double_crochet in
